title: Set up Apple code signing and notarization
description:
Reactivate Apple Developer account and configure macOS code signing + notarization for desktop app releases. Requires:
- Active Apple Developer Program membership ($99/year)
- Developer ID Application certificate
- Developer ID Installer certificate
- App-specific password for notarization
- Add signing secrets to GitHub Actions

title: Add staging/production environment support to cdk8s infra
Integrate Resend for sending verification and password reset emails
Investigate Tauri updater download progress UI options
description:
Before finalizing the update UX, investigate what download progress looks like with Tauri's updater plugin:
- What progress events does the updater emit?
- Can we show a native progress bar/dialog from Rust?
- What does it look like with just a spinner vs percentage vs progress bar?
- Make a decision on the download UX based on findings

title: Set SITE_URL environment variable for production deployment
